OrgName: TNS US, LLC., formerly TNS Custom Research, Inc., TNS Employee Insights
activities:
Names, contact details, demographic information, and opinions of consumers collected via surveys and other research techniques, such as focus groups.

TNS also designs and conducts employee, leader and customer surveys. Information such as names, email addresses and demographic information may be transferred by client organizations to our firm in our capacity as a research service provider.

Human resources data from company employees may be collected and transmitted to company offices in the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Client, Customer; On-Line, Off-Line & Manually Processed Data
recoursemech:
For HR data: We will cooperate with the EU DPAs and Swiss FDPIC
For all non-HR data: AAA
